tasks.name: Add trade-in and tax rate inputs to the calculator
tasks.notes: Calculator UI now surfaces trade-in and tax inputs alongside down payment, fees, APR, and term.

tasks.name: Call /api/quote from the frontend calculator
tasks.notes: Frontend submits the full payload to /api/quote and renders the API response including server-side totals.

tasks.name: Persist UTM parameters when tracking affiliate clicks
tasks.notes: Affiliate tracking posts stored UTM parameters to /api/track so attribution persists with each click.

tasks.name: Attach affiliate and UTM metadata to lead submissions
tasks.notes: Lead submissions include affiliate and UTM metadata, which are now persisted server-side.

tasks.name: Extend API tests for quote, track, and lead flows
tasks.notes: Pytest suite covers trade-in/tax scenarios and attribution persistence across leads and tracking.

summary: Calculator UI exposes trade-in value and tax rate with validation alongside existing financing fields.
Frontend now uses /api/quote so amount financed, payment, and interest mirror the server totals.
Affiliate tracking and lead capture persist affiliate and UTM metadata, verified by pytest coverage.
